languages.text: {n}Таддуа бросает на вас смутный взгляд. Словно нехотя, сквозь зубы, он выдавливает:{/n} "Таково слово Звездного Сиятельства... Да очистит тебя пламя Святого Фесмофориуса, еретик".

traits.locale_text: "Да очистит тебя пламя Святого Фесмофориуса, Ронда".

languages.text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."
languages.original_text: {n}Таддуа бросает на вас смутный взгляд. Словно нехотя, сквозь зубы, он выдавливает:{/n} "Таково слово Звездного Сиятельства... Да очистит тебя пламя Святого Фесмофориуса, еретик".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ursus gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "The Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

{n}Ursus gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "The Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

{n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

{n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

{n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

languages.text: {n}塔杜亚对你露出了阴沉的表情。他咬紧牙关，勉强说出了这些话。{/n}“来自上界的大人已经宣布了判决……愿圣菲斯摩弗瑞斯的烈焰净化你，异端分子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}塔杜亚对你露出了阴沉的表情。他咬紧牙关，勉强说出了这些话。{/n}“来自上界的大人已经宣布了判决……愿圣菲斯摩弗瑞斯的烈焰净化你，异端分子。”
{n}乌苏斯对你露出了阴沉的表情。他咬紧牙关，勉强说出了这些话。{/n}“来自上界的大人已经宣布了判决……愿圣菲斯摩弗瑞斯的烈焰净化你，异端分子。”

languages.text: {n}Taddua te mira con expresión sombría y se obliga a sí mismo a dictar sentencia, de mala gana y apretando los dientes:{/n} «Su Excelencia Celestial ha hablado... Que las llamas de san Fesmoforio te purifiquen, hereje».
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua te mira con expresión sombría y se obliga a sí mismo a dictar sentencia, de mala gana y apretando los dientes:{/n} «Su Excelencia Celestial ha hablado... Que las llamas de san Fesmoforio te purifiquen, hereje».

{n}Ursus te mira con expresión sombría y se obliga a sí mismo a dictar sentencia, de mala gana y apretando los dientes:{/n} «Su Excelencia Celestial ha hablado... Que las llamas de san Fesmoforio te purifiquen, hereje».

languages.text: {n}Taddua sana karanlık bir bakış atıyor. Sanki isteksizce ve sıkılmış dişlerinin arasından kelimeleri zorla çıkarıyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz konuştu... Aziz Pesmoforyus'un alevleri seni arındırsın kâfir."
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua sana karanlık bir bakış atıyor. Sanki isteksizce ve sıkılmış dişlerinin arasından kelimeleri zorla çıkarıyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz konuştu... Aziz Pesmoforyus'un alevleri seni arındırsın kâfir."

{n}Ursus sana karanlık bir bakış atıyor. Sanki isteksizce ve sıkılmış dişlerinin arasından kelimeleri zorla çıkarıyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz konuştu... Aziz Pesmoforyus'un alevleri seni arındırsın kâfir."

languages.text: {n}タッドゥアは、あなたにムッとした顔をする。まるで仕方がないかのように、食いしばった歯を通して、言葉を搾り出す。{/n}「天の閣下のお達しだ…聖なるフェスモフォリウスの炎よ、異端者を清め給え」
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}アーサスは、あなたにムッとした顔をする。まるで仕方がないかのように、食いしばった歯を通して、言葉を搾り出す。{/n}「天の閣下のお達しだ…聖なるフェスモフォリウスの炎よ、異端者を清め給え」
{n}アーサスは、あなたにムッとした顔をする。まるで仕方がないかのように、食いしばった歯を通して、言葉を搾り出す。{/n}「天の閣下のお達しだ…聖なるフェスモフォリウスの炎よ、異端者を清め給え」

languages.text: {n}Taddua vous adresse un regard noir, puis serre les dents et se fait violence pour prononcer les mots suivants :{/n} « Son Altesse Célestissime a parlé... Puissent les flammes de Saint Phesmophorius te purifier, hérétique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua vous adresse un regard noir, puis serre les dents et se fait violence pour prononcer les mots suivants :{/n} « Son Altesse Célestissime a parlé... Puissent les flammes de Saint Phesmophorius te purifier, hérétique. »

{n}Ursus vous adresse un regard noir, puis serre les dents et se fait violence pour prononcer les mots suivants :{/n} « Son Altesse Célestissime a parlé... Puissent les flammes de Saint Phesmophorius te purifier, hérétique. »

languages.text: {n}Taddua wirft dir einen finsteren Blick zu. Widerwillig und durch zusammengebissene Zähne presst er die Worte heraus:{/n} "{mf|Seine|Ihre} himmlische Hoheit hat gesprochen ... Mögen die Flammen des Heiligen Phesmophorius Euch läutern, Ketzer."
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua gives you a dark look. As if reluctantly, and through gritted teeth, he forces out the words:{/n} "{mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness has spoken... May the flames of Saint Phesmophorius purify you, heretic."
